definition: enclosing frame made of bamboo, wire etc/cage/basket/steamer basket/to cover/to cage/to embrace/to manipulate through trickery
bird/CL:隻|只[zhi1],群[qun2]/(dialect) to pay attention to/(intensifier) damned/goddam
bird in a basket, monkey in a cage (idiom); prisoner

sentences.english: The captive birds were trained to weigh themselves on electronic balances.
sentences.chinese: 籠鳥被訓練得自行在電子秤上稱體重。
